titleStmt.title: Foure letters one from the Duke of Bouillon to the French King. Dated in Feb. 1619. Another from the French King to the Duke of Espernon. Dated the 11. of Ian. 1619. Two other from the Duke of Espernon to the French King, the one dated the 17. of Ian the other the 7. of Feb. 1619.
titleStmt.author: Bouillon, Henri de la Tour-d'Auvergne, Duc de, 1555-1623. aut
Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1643. aut
Epernon, Jean-Louis de Nogaret de La Valette, duc d', 1554-1642. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at the great south dore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the great south dore of Pauls
